revision.text:
'''WSKIN''' (working title) is the name of an upcoming weapon mod by [[User:Wildweasel|WildWeasel]]. Its focus is not technological excellence - only to make a darn cool weapon mod. [[DECORATE]] usage for Heretic/Hexen/Strife items/weapons is planned.
=== External links === * [http://s7.invisionfree.com/Doom_Armory/index.php Discuss the weapon mod at Weasel's Doom Armory forums] [[category:Abandoned ZDoom Projects]]
